api_list.name: addTrackingNumberNotificationById
api_list.description: Add a tracking notification by system id

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: emails
optional_parameters.description: Email address(es) to receive email notifications.

optional_parameters.name: smses
optional_parameters.description: Phone number(s) to receive sms notifications. Enter + and area code before phone number.

api_list.name: addTrackingNumberNotificationByTrackingNumber
api_list.description: Add a tracking notification by tracking number

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: emails
optional_parameters.description: Email address(es) to receive email notifications.

optional_parameters.name: smses
optional_parameters.description: Phone number(s) to receive sms notifications. Enter + and area code before phone number.

api_list.name: createTracking
api_list.description: Create a tracking

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: trackingDestinationCountry
optional_parameters.description: Destination Country of the shipment for a specific courier. Required by some couriers, such as postnl-3s

optional_parameters.name: trackingAccountNumber
optional_parameters.description: Account number of the shipper for a specific courier. Required by some couriers, such as dynamic-logistics

optional_parameters.name: trackingPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The postal code of receiver's address. Required by some couriers, such asdeutsch-post

optional_parameters.name: trackingShippingDate
optional_parameters.description: Shipping date in YYYYMMDD format. Required by some couriers, such as deutsch-post

optional_parameters.name: trackingKey
optional_parameters.description: Key of the shipment for a specific courier. Required by some couriers, such as sic-teliway

optional_parameters.name: destinationCountryIso3
optional_parameters.description: Enter ISO Alpha-3(three letters)to specify the destination of the shipment. If you use postal service to send international shipments, AfterShip will automatically get tracking results at destination courier as well (e.g. USPS for USA).

optional_parameters.name: customFields
optional_parameters.description: Custom fields that accept any text string

optional_parameters.name: customerName
optional_parameters.description: Customer name of the tracking.

optional_parameters.name: orderId
optional_parameters.description: Text field for order ID

optional_parameters.name: orderIdPath
optional_parameters.description: Text field for order path

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Title of the tracking. Default value as tracking_number

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: Text field for the note

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: If not specified, Aftership will automatically detect the courier based on the tracking number format and your selected couriers. Use array to input a list of couriers for auto detect.

optional_parameters.name: android
optional_parameters.description: Google cloud message registration IDs to receive the push notifications.

optional_parameters.name: ios
optional_parameters.description: Apple iOS device IDs to receive the push notifications.

optional_parameters.name: emails
optional_parameters.description: Email address(es) to receive email notifications.

optional_parameters.name: smses
optional_parameters.description: Phone number(s) to receive sms notifications. Enter + and area code before phone number.

api_list.name: deleteTrackingByTrackingID
api_list.description: Delete tracking by system id

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

api_list.name: deleteTrackingByTrackingNumber
api_list.description: Delete tracking by tracking number.

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

api_list.name: detectCouriers
api_list.description: Return a list of matched couriers based on tracking number format and selected couriers or a list of couriers.

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: trackingShippingDate
optional_parameters.description: Shipping date in YYYYMMDD format. Required by some couriers, such as deutsch-post

optional_parameters.name: trackingKey
optional_parameters.description: Key of the shipment for a specific courier. Required by some couriers, such as sic-teliway

optional_parameters.name: trackingAccountNumber
optional_parameters.description: Account number of the shipper for a specific courier. Required by some couriers, such as dynamic-logistics

optional_parameters.name: trackingDestinationCountry
optional_parameters.description: Destination Country of the shipment for a specific courier. Required by some couriers, such as postnl-3s

optional_parameters.name: trackingPostalCode
optional_parameters.description: The postal code of receiver's address. Required by some couriers, such asdeutsch-post

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: If not specified, Aftership will automatically detect the courier based on the tracking number format and your selected couriers. Use array to input a list of couriers for auto detect.

api_list.name: getActivatedCouriers
api_list.description: Return a list of couriers activated at your AfterShip account.

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

api_list.name: getAllCouriers
api_list.description: Return a list of all couriers.

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

api_list.name: getLastCheckpointTrackingInfoById
api_list.description: Return the tracking information of the last checkpoint of a single tracking. by system id

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

required_parameters.name: trackingId
required_parameters.description: ID of the tracking in the system

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Default: '' / Example: 'en' Support Chinese to English translation for  china-ems  and  china-post  only

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields to include in the response. Fields to include: slug,created_at,checkpoint_time,city,coordinates,country_iso3, country_name,message,state,tag,zip

api_list.name: getLastCheckpointTrackingInfoByTrackingNumber
api_list.description: Return the tracking information of the last checkpoint of a single tracking. by tracking number

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Default: '' / Example: 'en' Support Chinese to English translation for  china-ems  and  china-post  only

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: List of fields to include in the response. Use array for multiple values. Fields to include: Fields to include: slug,created_at,checkpoint_time,city,coordinates,country_iso3, country_name,message,state,tag,zip

api_list.name: getSingleTrackingResultById
api_list.description: Get tracking results of a single tracking by system id

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

required_parameters.name: trackingId
required_parameters.description: ID of the tracking in the system

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Default: '' / Example: 'en' Support Chinese to English translation for  china-ems  and  china-post  only

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Unique courier code Use array for multiple values. Fields to include: tracking_postal_code,tracking_ship_date,tracking_account_number,tracking_key,tracking_destination_country,title,order_id,tag,checkpoints, checkpoint_time, message, country_name

api_list.name: getSingleTrackingResultByTrackingNumber
api_list.description: Get tracking results of a single tracking by tracking number

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Default: '' / Example: 'en' Support Chinese to English translation for  china-ems  and  china-post  only

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Unique courier code Use array for multiple values. Fields to include: tracking_postal_code,tracking_ship_date,tracking_account_number,tracking_key,tracking_destination_country,title,order_id,tag,checkpoints, checkpoint_time, message, country_name

api_list.name: getTrackingResults
api_list.description: Return a list of all couriers.

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: Api key you received from Aftership

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of trackings each page contain. (Default: 100, Max: 200)

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page to show. (Default: 1)

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Search the content of the tracking record fields

optional_parameters.name: deliveryTime
optional_parameters.description: Total delivery time in days. - Difference of 1st checkpoint time and delivered time for delivered shipments - Difference of 1st checkpoint time and current time for non-delivered shipments Value as 0 for pending shipments or delivered shipment with only one checkpoint.

optional_parameters.name: createdAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Start date and time of trackings created. AfterShip only stores data of 90 days.(Defaults: 30 days ago, Example: 2013-03-15T16:41:56+08:00)

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Current status of tracking. Values include: Pending,  InfoReceived,  InTransit,  OutForDelivery,  AttemptFail,  Delivered,  Exception,  Expired

optional_parameters.name: createdAtMax
optional_parameters.description: End date and time of trackings created. AfterShip only stores data of 90 days.(Defaults: 30 days ago, Example: 2013-03-15T16:41:56+08:00)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Default: '' / Example: 'en' Support Chinese to English translation for  china-ems  and  china-post  only

optional_parameters.name: slug
optional_parameters.description: Unique courier code Use array for multiple values

optional_parameters.name: origin
optional_parameters.description: Origin country of trackings. Use ISO Alpha-3 (three letters). Use array for multiple values.

optional_parameters.name: destination
optional_parameters.description: Destination country of trackings. Use ISO Alpha-3 (three letters). Use array for multiple values.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Unique courier code Use array for multiple values. Fields to include: title,  order_id,  tag,  checkpoints,  checkpoint_time,  message,  country_name

api_list.name: getUserContactInfoToNotifyById
api_list.description: Get contact information for the users to notify when the tracking changes. Please note that only customer receivers will be returned. Any email, sms or webhook that belongs to the Store will not be returned.
